articles.title: Marcus Semien, Blue Jays knock around Mariners - Reuters
articles.description: Marcus Semien had a three-run homer and a two-run double, Bo Bichette hit a three-run homer and the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the visiting Seattle Mariners 9-3 Tuesday at Buffalo.
articles.content:
By Field Level Media

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Canada's TSX posts first close above 20,000 as resource shares rally - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock market index closed above the 20,000 level for the first time on Friday as higher commodity prices bolstered the shares of resource companies.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
